sentences.en: ...the buying and selling of stocks and shares.
sentences.cn: …证券和股票的买卖。

sentences.en: also on the stocks is a bill to bring about tax relief for these businesses.
sentences.cn: 一个减免这些行业税收的法案也正在酝酿之中。

sentences.en: As stock prices have dropped, so too has bank capital.
sentences.cn: 随着股价下跌，银行资本也减少了。

sentences.en: Buy now while stocks last!
sentences.cn: 存货有限，欲购从速！

sentences.en: Drain the beans thoroughly and save the stock for soup.
sentences.cn: 将豆角彻底控干，并把滤出的豆汁留下做汤。

sentences.en: He acted as grand marshal of a stock car race.
sentences.cn: 他担任过改装赛车大赛的主持人。

sentences.en: he needed a period of peace and quiet in order to &B{take stock of} his life.
sentences.cn: 他需要一段平静的时光来审视自己的生活。

sentences.en: He's been studying and playing the stock market since he was 14.
sentences.cn: 他从14岁起就一直在研究和买卖证券。

sentences.en: I don't put much stock in modern medicine.
sentences.cn: 我不太信任现代医学。

sentences.en: I had to stock the boat up with food.
sentences.cn: 我得在船上备足干粮。

sentences.en: I'll have to take stock, go carefully and regain my buoyancy.
sentences.cn: 我将不得不审时度势，小心行事，同时保持乐观。

sentences.en: It was time to take stock of the situation.
sentences.cn: 是时候统观一下形势了。

sentences.en: Lemon and lime juice were both temporarily out of stock.
sentences.cn: 柠檬汁和酸橙汁暂时都缺货。

sentences.en: My boss had a stock response – "If it ain't broke, don't fix it!"
sentences.cn: 我的老板是老一套的回答–“没坏的话就别修了！”

sentences.en: On the Stock Exchange, aggressive buying propped the market up.
sentences.cn: 在证券交易所，市场在大量买单的推动下有所上扬。

sentences.en: Salt the stock to your taste and leave it simmering very gently.
sentences.cn: 根据自己的口味给原汤加点盐，然后用文火慢炖。

sentences.en: She built up her fortune by cannily playing the stock market.
sentences.cn: 她炒股有方，发了大财。

sentences.en: stocks and shares
sentences.cn: 股份与股票

sentences.en: The authorities have urged people to stock up on fuel.
sentences.cn: 当局已经敦促人们储备燃料。

sentences.en: The market might abandon the stock, and knock down its price.
sentences.cn: 市场可能会抛售该股票，从而令其股价下跌。

sentences.en: The rule applies where a person owns stock in a corporation.
sentences.cn: 该规定适用于持有公司股票的人。

sentences.en: the trading of stocks and shares
sentences.cn: 股票交易

sentences.en: Vegetables such as peppers can overpower the flavor of the stock.
sentences.cn: 像甜椒这样的蔬菜会抢了原汤的味道。

sentences.en: We have a huge stock of quality carpets on sale.
sentences.cn: 我们备有大量优质地毯出售。

sentences.en: We stock a wide range of kitchen equipment.
sentences.cn: 我们备有各种厨房用品。

sentences.en: When a nearby shop burned down, our stock was ruined by smoke.
sentences.cn: 附近一家商店被烧成灰烬，我们的存货也被浓烟熏坏了。

words.tran_cn: 有库存的批发商或零售商，存有货物出售的商行
[金融]股份，股票；[贸易]库存；血统；树干

phrases.tran_cn: 有现货的：能被出售或使用的；手头的
无现货的：不能被使用或出售的
(澳/新西兰)经营（或供应）农产品的公司（或代理商）
股票市场；证券市场；股票交易
股票价格；股票行市；交易所卖价
检讨（局势）；估量，估计；审视

trans.tran_en: something that is available in a shop and does not have to be ordered

trans.tran_cn: 股份，股票，库存，树干，家畜

trans.tran_en: if a shop stocks a particular product, it keeps a supply of it to sell
if a shop stocks a particular product, it keeps a supply of it to sell
